Context:
* George Brown College offers mentoring by industry's best chefs to develop technical skills, creativity, and flair.
* Students are recognized by the industry as some of the best and George Brown is perceived by GTA employers as producing highest quality graduates.
* Industry partners ensure programs are current and cutting-edge.
* 14-week externships prepare students for fast-paced work environments in city's best restaurants and hotels.
* Opportunity to complete a study placement abroad at world-renowned schools.
* Program offers Monday to Friday classes from 7:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. on the second floor of Centre for Hospitality and Culinary Arts building located at 300 Adelaide St. E.
* Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* Follow the college on Twitter @GBCCAFE and sign up for updates at their website.
* Students are responsible for verifying fee requirements.
* Information contained in the website is subject to change without notice.
